After Cobalt-B uses her discharge skill, restore a random amount of weapon charge between **90** to **180** points.

weapon.name: Flaming Revolver
advancements: Each round of Barrage deals additional damage equal to **2%** of the target's current HP (cannot exceed **180%** of ATK).
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Heavy Bombardment branch skill and Close Quaters dodge attack inflic **Ion Scorch** on targets that are already burned, dealing flame damage equal to **40%** of ATK every second for **10** seconds
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
The damage from **Ion Scorch** increases to **60%** of ATK. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skill will refrest the duration of **Ion Scorch**.

**Barrage** has a **15**-second burning effect. Successful attacks with any weapon's dodge skill reduces the cooldown of **Barrage** by **4** seconds. The cooldown of the effect: **1.5** seconds. The DoT burn from the dodge skill also triggers a cooldown reduction effect.

skills.name: Normal Attack
skills.description: On the ground, use normal attack to launch 5 attacks in a row.
detailed: The first attack deals total damage equal to **52.3%** of ATK plus **3**.
The second attack deals total damage equal to **75.6%** of ATK plus **4**.
The third attack deals total damage equal to **94.5%** of ATK plus **5**.
The fourth attack deals total damage equal to **142.8%** of ATK plus **8**.
The fifth attack deals total damage equal to **137.8%** of ATK plus **7**.

skills.name: Charged Shot
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge an attack and release to fire rounds, dealing **95.4%** of ATK plus **5** damage, plus an explosion 3 seconds later (or if the target dies), dealing **23.9%** of ATK as damage to nearby enemies. Each time the target is dealt damage during the explosion (up to **4** times), AoE is doubled and damage is increased.

skills.name: Jumping Blast
skills.description: While airborne or after jumping once, launch Jumping Blast. Toss a bomb that deals damage equal to **90.8%** of ATK plus **5** to enemies in a circle ahead, knocking them back a short distance. Consumes **250** endurance.

skills.name: Aerial Discharge
skills.description: After double-jumping, launch Aerial Discharge in mid-air. Fire an Omnium beam downward. The beam then sweeps forward, dealing damage equal to **33.8%** of ATK plus **2**.

skills.name: Heavy Bombardment
skills.description: Hold attack button during a normal attack to unleash Suppressing Fire in front, dealing enemies AoE damage equal to **102%** of ATK plus **5** in total.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for **0.5** seconds.

skills.name: Close Quaters
skills.description: Use normal attack right after dodging to trigger Close Quarters. Deal damage equal to **156.1%** of ATK plus **8** to targets in a frontal cone area.

skills.name: Barrage
skills.description: Constant fire in a frontal cone area to deal total damage equal to **666%** of ATK plus *35* damage. Cooldown: **60** seconds.

skills.name: Explosive Rain
skills.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, switching to this weapon from another weapon **removes all debuffs from the wielder** and unleashes **3** grenades forward, dealing AoE damage equal to **570%** of ATK plus **30** in total and causing **launch**.
